tasks.title: Write product spec for Company entity
tasks.description: Write a product spec for the Company entity. Fields: name (string, unique, 3-50 chars), status (active/suspended). Describe each field's purpose, constraints, validation rules, and edge cases. Include the 5 UI states (loading, empty, error, partial, populated). Output plain English spec, NOT code.

tasks.title: Create Company table schema
tasks.description: Based on the Company spec from test-001, write the Convex defineTable() with validators. Use v.string(), v.number(), v.union(v.literal(...)) from convex/values. Output ONLY the defineTable code block.

tasks.title: Validate Company spec vs schema
tasks.description: Compare the Company spec (test-001 output) against the Company schema (test-002 output). Check: all spec fields exist in schema, types match constraints, indexes support likely queries. Return PASS with confirmation or FAIL with specific issues listed.
